name: LY_COMMON_STYLES
code:
export const LY_COMMON_STYLES = {
  fill: lyl `{
    position: absolute
    top: 0
    bottom: 0
    left: 0
    right: 0
  }`,
  visuallyHidden: lyl `{
    border: 0
    clip: rect(0 0 0 0)
    height: 1px
    margin: -1px
    overflow: hidden
    padding: 0
    position: absolute
    width: 1px
    outline: 0
    -webkit-appearance: none
    -moz-appearance: none
  }`,
  button: lyl `{
    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent
    background-color: transparent
    border: 0
    -moz-appearance: none
    -webkit-appearance: none
    margin: 0
    outline: none
    box-sizing: border-box
    position: relative
    text-decoration-line: none
    -webkit-text-decoration-line: none
    &::-moz-focus-inner: {
      border: 0
    }
  }`
};
